"開始5150":
"/ci1 3 ...Aha, what a happy coincidence. It seems I have encountered a spot of bother...
Perhaps I could prevail upon you to aid me?"

"/ci1 2 For your assistance, I must thank you.
...Why am I wearing a bathing costume?
Why, because we are on such a spectacular beach, of course!"

"Ah, well-judged. It is always wiser to avoid a battle when one has no chance of victory.
...If you will excuse me."

"Ah, but there was so much I could have done...
Such sights I could have seen..."

"Are you safe?
My pets... My beloved children...
Leave all the rest to me."
